mapper.select: SELECT bal.code AS code, bal.name AS name, bd.department_name AS departmentName, bal.opt_object AS optObject, CONCAT(bal.opt_type, bal.description) AS description, bal.opt_time AS optTime FROM permission_user AS pu RIGHT JOIN basicinfo_action_log AS bal ON (bal.user_code = pu.code) LEFT JOIN basicinfo_department AS bd ON (pu.department_code = bd.code) ORDER BY bal.opt_time

SELECT bal.code AS code, bal.name AS name, bd.department_name AS departmentName, bal.opt_object AS optObject, CONCAT(bal.opt_type, bal.description) AS description, bal.opt_time AS optTime FROM permission_user AS pu RIGHT JOIN basicinfo_action_log AS bal ON (bal.user_code = pu.code) LEFT JOIN basicinfo_department AS bd ON (pu.department_code = bd.code) WHERE (bal.opt_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) ORDER BY bal.opt_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basicinfo_action_log (user_code, name, opt_object, opt_type, description, opt_time) VALUES (#{userCode}, (SELECT name FROM permission_user WHERE code = #{userCode}), #{optObject}, #{optType}, #{description}, #{optTime})
